alert.note: Alert for Inland Matagorda; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:50PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wharton and northwestern Matagorda Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 449 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Markham, or 10 miles northwest of Bay City, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Markham, Midfield and Danevang. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
